title: 群峦的MCPC服务端，玩家退出时候删除信息
author: 我的世界愤怒了
txt_content:
04.04 11:30:47 [Server] INFO Night_Raids issued an AuthMe command!
04.04 11:30:42 [Multicraft] Night_Raids ran command 每日信息
04.04 11:30:42 [Connect] User Night_Raids, IP 114.224.179.212
04.04 11:30:40 [Server] INFO PlayerManager Successfully removed player Night_Raids
04.04 11:30:40 [Server] INFO §eNight_Raids left the game.
04.04 11:30:40 [Server] INFO Connection reset

replies.author: Smaoll
replies.txt_content: 把PlayerManager这个插件删了就没问题了

replies.author: 我的世界愤怒了
replies.txt_content:
Smaoll 发表于 2015-4-4 13:56
把PlayerManager这个插件删了就没问题了
试过了=-=删掉没用=-=
